sentences.sContent: Trees or shrubs. Leaves petiolate , entire or serrate at margin.
sentences.sContent_eng: Trees or shrubs. Leaves petiolate , entire or serrate at margin.
sentences.sCn: 乔木或灌木叶具叶柄，全缘的或有锯齿在边缘。

sentences.sContent: Calyx segment margin denticulate or serrate, at least once near apex.
sentences.sContent_eng: Calyx segment margin denticulate or serrate, at least once near apex.
sentences.sCn: 花萼裂片边缘具小齿或有锯齿，至少一旦近先端。

sentences.sContent: Leaves simple, exstipulate, alternate, rarely opposite, entire or serrate at margin.
sentences.sContent_eng: Leaves simple, exstipulate, alternate, rarely opposite, entire or serrate at margin.
sentences.sCn: 单叶，无托叶， 互生，很少对生，全缘的或有锯齿在边缘。

words.tran: 有细锯齿的；细锯齿状的，细锯齿边的
（行扫描起点不一致引起屏幕上的）锯齿状；锯齿状突起（等于serrature）

trans.tranOther: (of leaves) having a margin of forward pointing teeth
